channel.title: Omar Vasquez's GitHub Pages
channel.description: The GitHub adventures of Omar Vasquez @oevl

item.title: Windows 7 downgrade at work
item.dc:creator: @oevl
item.description:
At work I had to downgrade three computers from Windows 10 to Windows 7, one desktop and two laptops. The desktop needed a new drive so I installed a SSD drive, and the process took almost two days, including processing the previous updates and installing Office 365 thru our subscription.

But the two laptops, a couple of Acer One D255E's with just 1GB of RAM have been giving me a hard time during the updating process, they are too slow and under powered (Atom CPUs) and I have been facing many errors because of that.

item.title: Starting anew
item.dc:creator: @oevl
item.description: So I am starting anew with a blog powered by Nikola hosted on Github Pages. But it's half an hour after midnight and I have to go to bed, tomorrow is a working day for me and for Ana.

item.title: Welcome to Nikola
item.dc:creator: Roberto Alsina
item.description:
If you can see this in a web browser, it means you managed to install Nikola, and build a site using it. Congratulations!

Next steps:

  • Read the manual

  • Visit the Nikola website to learn more

  • See a demo photo gallery

  • See a demo listing

  • See a demo of a longer text

Send feedback to info@getnikola.com!
